Frequently Asked Questions

Quick answers to common questions about keepTheScore

Getting Started

How do I create a leaderboard? +

Creating a leaderboard is simple! Visit keepTheScore.com, click "Create New Board," choose your template, and customize it with your team names and settings. The whole process takes less than 5 minutes.

Do I need technical skills to use keepTheScore? +

No technical skills are required! Our interface is designed to be intuitive and user-friendly. If you can use email or social media, you can create and manage a leaderboard.

Is keepTheScore free to use? +

Yes! keepTheScore offers a free plan that includes all basic features. Premium plans are available for advanced features like custom branding, unlimited players, and API access.

Features & Functionality

Does the scoreboard update in real-time? +

Yes! All changes to scores and rankings update instantly across all devices viewing the leaderboard. No need to refresh the page.

Can I customize the appearance of my leaderboard? +

Absolutely! You can customize colors, fonts, logos, backgrounds, and more. Premium plans offer even more customization options including custom CSS.

How many players can I add to a leaderboard? +

The free plan supports up to 20 players per leaderboard. Premium plans support unlimited players, perfect for large organizations or events.

Privacy & Security

Who can view my leaderboard? +

You have complete control! You can make leaderboards public, password-protected, or accessible only via a private link. You can change these settings at any time.

Is my data secure? +

Yes, we take security seriously. All data is encrypted, we're GDPR compliant, and we never share your information with third parties. You can delete your data at any time.

Integration & Advanced Features

Can I integrate with Google Sheets or Excel? +

Yes! Premium plans include integration with Google Sheets, allowing automatic updates from your spreadsheets. We also offer CSV import/export and API access.

Related Guide:

How to Create a Leaderboard in Google Sheets →
Can I add player photos or logos? +

Yes! You can add player photos, team logos, and custom images to make your leaderboard more engaging and personalized.

Related Guide:

How to Add Player Images →
Can I embed the leaderboard on my website? +

Yes! You can embed your leaderboard on any website using our iframe code. The embedded version updates in real-time just like the main board.

Still have questions? Visit keepTheScore.com for more help and resources.
